title: What is a Convolutional Neural Network Part 1
description: This video covers the architecture of a Convolutional Neural Network, focusing on the concept of "filters".

timestamps.title: Flattenng the image causes a loss of information
Filter is a matrix of numbers
Known filters draw out different features
Neural network learn filters that identify features
Coding a convolutional neural network in p5js
Finding the one-dimenstional look-up into matrix
Four numbers are stored for every pixel
Change the indices to find vertical edges

codeExamples.title: Convlutional Neural Network
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates the process of creating a convolutional layer to filter pixels.

links.title: MobileNets: Efficient Convolutional Neural Networks for Mobile Vision Applications
Train a Neural Network with Pixels as Input
links.description: This tutorial builds on ml5.neuralNetwork() videos examining raw pixels as inputs to a neural network. This sets the stage for a discussion on convolutional neural networks.

links.title: Image Classification with MobileNet
links.description: In this video, I use the "pre-trained" MobileNet model to classify the content of an image.

links.title: Other Neural Network Videos
links.description: This playlist accompanies Chapter 10 of The Nature of Code book.

links.title: The Pixel Array
links.description: This video looks at how to access the pixels of an HTML5 canvas in p5.js. Code.
